title: Are Layer 2s the Key to Ethereumâ€™s Future?: Unchained w/ Vivek Raman
text:
Synopsis
Layer 2 solutions represent a strategic opportunity for corporations to enter the Ethereum ecosystem, offering high-profit potential through customizable blockchain platforms that can generate value for both Ethereum and corporate stakeholders.

Key Insights
- Layer 2 solutions provide corporations with a profitable entry point into the Ethereum ecosystem
- L2s can offer customizable blockchain parameters, including options for KYC and different operational settings
- The model allows corporations to collect fees, onboard users, and create specialized blockchain environments
- L2 solutions create a symbiotic relationship that generates value for both Ethereum and corporate entities
- The approach enables a "Mosaic of innovation" built on the Ethereum infrastructure
